p: Using N-Iodosuccinimide (1.1 eq) and following general procedure of halogenation, the title compound ( 31c) was obtained in 61% yield from 30: 1H NMR (300 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 7.62–7.67 (m, 1H), 7.93 (dd, J = 1.5, 8.1 Hz, 1H), 8.05 (dd, J = 1.2, 7.5 Hz, 1H), 8.65 (d, J = 2.1 Hz, 1H), 9.17 (d, J = 2.1 Hz, 1H); 13 C NMR (75 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 92.1, 124.3, 126.5, 130.3, 131.1, 137.6, 143.8, 148.2, 157.9.
